TextView.android:text:
A,B,C - designation for the Annulus
 ACC - accessory (e.g. SPM or landing nipple)
 MG(kilopascals per metre) - Mud or brine pressure gradient
 PC(kilopascals) - Collapse pressure
 PB(kilopascals) - Burst pressure 
 FS (kilopascals per metre)- Formation strength gradient
 BF(kilopascals per metre) - Base fluid (refers to base fluid of mud in outer casing)
 TVD(metres) - True vertical depth (Dtvd) 
 FP(kilopascals per metre) - Formation pressure
 MAASP(kilopascals) - Maximum allowable Annular Surface Pressure
 Form(kilopascals) - Formation pressure 
 G - Gradient
 LH - Liner Hanger
 PP - Production Packer
 RD - Rupture Disk
 SH - Casing shon
 SV - Safety Valve
 TBG - Tubing
 TOC -Top of cement
 MudG(kilopascals per metre) - Mud Gradient
 GasG(kilopascals per metre) - Gas Gradient
 CemG(kilopascals per metre) - Cement Gradient
 hGas(meters) - height of Gas column
 hMud(meters) - height of Mud column
 hCement(meters) - height of Cement column
 ProdCGr - Production casing Grade
 ExtCGr/ExternalCGr - External casing Grade
 NextExternalCGr - Next external casing tube grade
 IntCGr - Internal casing grade
 Examples of grades: H-40, J-55, K-55, N-80, L-80, C-90, C-95, T-95, P-110, Q-125
 D(meters) - Diameter
 t(meters) - thickness of tube wall
